Home.name: I'm Davi Seagull
Home.description: I am an experienced and versatile developer, with over 4 years of professional experience and proficiency in both front-end and back-end technologies.
Home.second-description: I have extensive experience in developing REST, GraphQL, and SOAP APIs. I demonstrate leadership skills and excel in successfully leading teams in project development.

tegla-nfe.title: Tegla NFe
tegla-nfe.description: Web application to help Tegla customers generate invoices and control vehicle inventory

mrs-inloco.title: MRS Inloco
mrs-inloco.description: Web application to help MRS customers track the transportation of their products with features such as real-time tracking using the OpenStreetMap API, summary of all products by origin or destination or current position, management of invoices per wagon, among others.
